trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> element in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref>組態檔中的項目。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The `<federationConfiguration>` element contains the settings that configure the WS-Federation Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>) and the Session Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>).
trans-unit.target: `<federationConfiguration>`元素包含 WS-同盟驗證模組的設定 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>) 和工作階段驗證模組 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>)。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfigurationElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定子<xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: The `<cookieHandler>` element configures the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> object that the Session Authentication Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>) uses to read and write cookies.
trans-unit.target: `<cookieHandler>`項目會設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>物件的工作階段驗證模組 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>) 用來讀取和寫入 cookie。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>

trans-unit.source: The child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 子系<xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom child configuration element, if one exists.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自訂的子組態項目，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: The custom configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 自訂組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_identityConfigurationName" name="identityConfigurationName" href=""></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_identityConfigurationName" name="identityConfigurationName" href=""></xref>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<identityConfiguration>" name="<identityConfiguration>" href=""></xref> section to associate with this <xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 名稱<xref uid="langword_csharp_<identityConfiguration>" name="<identityConfiguration>" href=""></xref>與這一節<xref uid="langword_csharp_<federationConfiguration>" name="<federationConfiguration>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this element has been configured with non-default values.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否使用非預設值設定這個項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has been configured with non-default values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已設定此項目，使用非預設值。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_name" name="name" href=""></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_name" name="name" href=""></xref>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `name` attribute sets the name to associate with this `<federationConfiguration>` element.
trans-unit.target: `name`屬性會設定與此相關聯的名稱`<federationConfiguration>`項目。

trans-unit.source: If the Name property is `null`, the current element is the default federation configuration.
trans-unit.target: 如果 [名稱] 屬性是`null`，目前的項目是預設的同盟設定。

trans-unit.source: The name of this federation configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 這個同盟的組態項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<serviceCertificate>" name="<serviceCertificate>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定子<xref uid="langword_csharp_<serviceCertificate>" name="<serviceCertificate>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: The `<serviceCertificate>` element provides location and validation settings for the X.509 certificate that is used to encrypt and decrypt tokens.
trans-unit.target: `<serviceCertificate>`項目會提供用來加密和解密權杖的 X.509 憑證的位置和驗證設定。

trans-unit.source: The child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<serviceCertificate>" name="<serviceCertificate>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 子系<xref uid="langword_csharp_<serviceCertificate>" name="<serviceCertificate>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsFederation>" name="<wsFederation>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定子<xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsFederation>" name="<wsFederation>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: The `<wsFederation>` element provides configuration for the WS-Federation Configuration Module (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>).
trans-unit.target: `<wsFederation>`項目會提供 WS-同盟設定模組的設定 (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>)。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: The child <xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsFederation>" name="<wsFederation>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 子系<xref uid="langword_csharp_<wsFederation>" name="<wsFederation>" href=""></xref>項目。
